name: Chaos Concerto
description:
Help our Lil' Miss Conductor lead her first symphony and break musical rules. Try to keep rhythm and maintain composure as the stage begins to fall apart in this Chaos Concerto! Controls: Press the corresponding arrow key (← ↑ → ↓) whenever an arrow icon lines up with an instrument block in it's lane. Made for Alberta Game Jam 2022, with collaboration from Mike GP (Producer, Audio Programmer, Technical Artist); Orion (Programmer); Ross (Lead Programmer); and Kailey (Composer + Sound Artist)!

Game created using Unity game engine. Plugins include:

  • FMOD
  • LeanTween
